org.jplot2d.element

Interface ImageBandTransform

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Element
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImageBandTransformEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageBandTransformImpl

    public interface ImageBandTransform
extends Element
    This class defines how to transform a band of image. The transformation takes these steps:
    1. Apply limit algorithm
    2. Apply intensity transform
    3. Apply bias/gain. method of Schlick (C. Schlick, Fast Alternatives to Perlin's Bias and Gain Functions)

      • setLimitsAlgorithm

        void setLimitsAlgorithm(@Nonnull
                      LimitsAlgorithm algo)
        Sets the LimitsAlgorithm to calculate cutting limits. The default algorithm is MinMaxAlgorithm.
        Parameters:
        algo - the LimitsAlgorithm

        void setIntensityTransform(@Nullable
                         IntensityTransform it)

        Parameters:
        it - the IntensityTransform to be applied

      • getBias

        double getBias()
        Returns the bias value. The default value is 0.5.
        Returns:
        the bias value

      • setBias

        void setBias(double bias)
        Sets the bias value. The valid range is [0,1] and the default value is 0.5.
        Parameters:
        bias - the bias value
        See Also:
        C. Schlick, Fast Alternatives to Perlin's Bias and Gain Functions

      • getGain

        double getGain()
        Returns the gain value. The default value is 0.5.
        Returns:
        the gain value

      • setGain

        void setGain(double gain)
        Sets the gain value. The valid range is [0,1] and the default value is 0.5.
        Parameters:
        gain - the gain value
        See Also:
        C. Schlick, Fast Alternatives to Perlin's Bias and Gain Functions
